r.d: Correctly-rounded arbitrary precision decimal floating-point arithmetic in PHP 7
r.n: - Default decimal precision changed from 28 to 34. - Decimal operations now use the **minimum** precision of all operands. - Added `Decimal\Rational` implementation for rational numbers (fractions). - Added `Decimal\Number` abstract class. - Performance improvements, reduced object allocations. - Private constructors, static initializers via `valueOf`.
